reviewText: This is not a game. It is a tech demo, and not a well-presented one. There is potential here, but it needs a surprising amount of work. This should not be for sale.

date: I have not regretted spent $ 4. Maybe the game does not live up to all my expectations

hoursPlayed: this game was like a casino in Los Angeles
